name: Sacrifices (Codinggamer)
description:
Use left, right, up to control.

a platform game for ldjam43.  

You only can Sacrifices the lives to generate the platform to complete the level.

Behind the Scene

After two days I finally finish this. This is the first time I complete the game in ld. Feel very happy.

The theme is Sacrifices must be made. And I think that can make a game sacrifice player can make a new road to complete. 

So I make this.

In this game the tools I use is:

GameMaker ( for game logic )

Aseprite ( for game art )

Bfxr ( for sound )

BeepBox ( for music )
